column6:
There is a comfy Queen size bed with dresser. Guests will use a shared bathroom. 
Standard room rate is for two people. It would be possible to accommodate more than 2 persons upon request. 
Please no smoking in the house. (You may smoke outside if cigarette butts are disposed in a sealed container.)
Please no illegal activity on the premises.
Please no eating in the room, use the dining room or kitchen.
column9: Spacious and comfortable room with shared bathroom
